text:
The project has been going on for about ten months now. And so far just the ground floor. We will move to the upstairs early next year. The wallpaper behind the shelving is by an American wallpaper/fabric house called Thibaut. 
The salary is really dictated by the company you work from, I would say from my position I work for a small company so not an excessive amount. I worked for a larger firm before in London that was on a more than generous wage. The creative industry is hard to gauge a precise salary.
